name: major
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: major
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: more important, bigger, or more serious than others of the same type
trans_examp.trans_cn: 较重要的；主要的；重大的

example.eg: All of her major plays have been translated into English.
example.egtrans: 她的主要剧本都被译成了英文。

example.eg: Sugar is a major cause of tooth decay.
example.egtrans: 糖是造成蛀牙的主要原因。

example.eg: There are two problems with this situation, one major, one minor.
example.egtrans: 这一情况牵涉到两个问题，一个主要的，一个次要的。

example.eg: Citrus fruits are a major source of vitamin C.
example.egtrans: 柑橘类水果是维生素C的重要来源。

example.eg: There has been a major change in attitudes recently.
The United States is a major influence in the United Nations.
example.egtrans: 美国是联合国中有重要影响的国家。

dsense.name: major
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: belonging or relating to a musical scale that is generally thought to have a happy sound

name: major
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: major
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an officer of middle rank in the British, US, and many other armed forces
trans_examp.trans_cn: （英军、美军及其他军队中的）少校

example.eg: Her father was a major in the Scots Guards.
example.egtrans: 她父亲曾是苏格兰近卫团的少校。

dsense.name: major
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the most important subject that a college or university student is studying, or the student himself or herself
trans_examp.trans_cn: （大学生的）专业，主修课程；（大学专业的）主修学生

example.eg: What is your major, English or French?
example.egtrans: 你的专业是英语还是法语？

example.eg: She was a philosophy major at an Ivy League college.
example.egtrans: 她曾在一所长春藤大学主修哲学。

name: major
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to study something as your main subject at college or university

example.eg: She majored in philosophy at Harvard.
example.egtrans: 她曾在哈佛大学主修哲学。
